meanings.sent1: The completers of the puzzle were proud of their teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The completers of the race received medals for their achievement.
meanings.sent3: The completers of the scavenger hunt found the hidden treasure first.
meanings.sent4: She was the completer of the group, always finishing tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The completers of the project celebrated their success with a party.

meanings.definition: Something that completes or makes whole.
meanings.sent1: The missing piece was the completer of the jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent2: Adding the final ingredient was the completer of the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The completer of the outfit was the stylish hat she wore.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the completer of her beautiful face.
meanings.sent5: The last brushstroke was the completer of the painting, bringing it to life.
